attributes.action: call a general election or resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon brown and the labour party need to be gotten rid of. We need to bring back TRUE british intrests into politics, none of this letting in an immagrant every 3 minutes and stupid prison sentences where its a risoners 'right' to watch tv...no its bloody not, they have no rights, they lost them when they chose to break the law. Anyway, lets bring in a proper party!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
